title: EASYLOCK 3 Pack Airtight Food Storage Container with Lids, Plastic Meal Prep Containers Reusable, 1.15L, Leak-proof Microwave Freezer Dishwasher Safe (Blue)
features: LOCK THE DILICIOUS FOOD—Airtight food containers with 4 snap airtight locking lid.The smart-locking system keeps it tightly sealed so meals are kept fresh for long time.Airtight food storage food containers never endure spilled food in your bag again.

USE EASYLOCK EVERYWHERE—Who doesn't want to have a food storage container that can be easily taken out? It can not only be used at home, but also be easily taken out. It won't be a burden for you to go out, whether in the office, school or outdoors.

3 PACK-PERFECT COMBINATION NUMBER—The 3-piece food storage container is suitable for meal prep or leftovers storage in the kitchen. The capacity is 1150ml / 38.9oz , enough to fill the normal amount of food. （size：20.3*13.3*6.8cm）

PUT YOUR HEALTH IN FIRST—EASYLOCK plastic food containers are made of food grade plastic, Safe and non-toxic food storage containers are good for the health of adults and kids, bring more peace of mind for your family.

MICROWAVE, FREEZER, DISHWASHER SAFE—Our food containers are resistant to high temperatures, so you can cook food directly in the microwave (without lids, 2-4 mins under 140℃). And it's no problem to refrigerate in the refrigerator too(≧-20℃)!
description: Product Description Worried about messy kitchen cabinets? EASYLOCK products can easily solve this problem. EASYLOCK products have various sizes and capacities of food storage containers.Appropriate unique design, fashionable appearance, it is a good aid of you when you are at home or go out for traveling. Airtight lid High quality Easy to use with snap and lock lid & easy to clean <3 Pack> Plastic Food Storage Containers Set Lunch Box ------------Effective arrangement of food and kitchen space, just 1 step！ Do you get up every morning and cook in a hurry, but you feel irritable when you see the messy food ? If you already got tired of this, then don't hesitate to choose our food storage containers set. No longer messy, you will get everything you want very quickly. Brand：EASYLOCK Specifications：3 pack×1150ml/38.9oz What can hold in containers：meal prep,leftovers,fruits,vegetables,salad,meat,pasta,even can stored a mask. Simple, clean and space saving design. More Details About Our Product ↓ Smart-locking Lid The lid forms an airtight seal, making sure your food stays fresh longer than in other normal plastic containers. Silicone Seal Seal to prevent leakage and overflow. It also keeps dirt and foreign particles away from your food. BPA Free Thicken pp material,BPA free,durable and sturdy. Non-toxic and no effect on you & family's health. Easy to Clean The dirt in the container is easy to clean. And the food containers are clear like glass so you can always see what's inside.
